version_description:
1) fix bugs;
2) Chess Pass Update.

[New]
1. Added new race - God, and two God piece: Mars and Zeus
2. Added new items: Axe of Fury, Teleport Dagger, Kira Axe and Claw Wand
3. Added new mode: Novice Mode and Fantasy Mode (Available every Friday - Sunday)
4. Added Custom Game

【New】
1. Added Strange Egg, a new Piece that costs 5 Golds, can be obtained at any level

【Optimization】
1. The team up slots in Fantasy Mode is up to 4.
2. Optimized descriptions for some Classes, Pieces, Skill names and actions.

[New]
1. Added new Pieces: Shining Archer
2. Added In-game Items Inheritance System: The items of the defeated chess player will be randomly assigned to the currently surviving player with a 50% probability
3. Added special effects for Win Str
Added Indonesian language

[Piece Adjustment]
1. Added new Piece - Fortune Teller
2. Blight Sorcerer is temporary removed from Casual, Ranked and other Mode and it will return when the time is calling.


[New Function]
1. Added new Fantasy Mode - Band of Brothers<

[New]
1. New Piece: Rogue Guard; Skull Hunter is temporary removed
2. New Fantasy Mode: Among Brothers, Start From Zero
3. New Leaderboard: Wins Leaderboard
4. Recommended Items: When you drag or select an Item in the game, the recommended Pie
Fixed data error in Settlement Leaderboard

[New]
1. Added new Piece - Winter Chiropteran
2. Added new permanent Mode - Duo Mode
3. Added Auto Star-up function with switch in Settings
4. Added Auto Deploy function with switch in Settings
5. Added Leaderboard: Serial Top 1
6.

[New]
1. Added Ranked (Duo) Mode, available with Season S3.
2. Added Item Selection function in Creeps Rounds, you will now choose 1 from 3 Items with a win or a draw, or only 1 Item to get with a loss. Meanwhile the drop rate is now reduced.
3.

1. Servers Optimization and updating
2. Improve the game experience

[New]
1. Chess piece, Kira, returns
2. Chess piece Skin changing system
3. New chat function for audiences in Spectator Mode
4. Novice Mode and Casual Mode (Duo) are now available in Custom Rooms
5. Equipments will be automatically pic

[New art design]
1. Brand new interface style
2. Optimized all Chess pieces models
3. Optimized all Items icons
4. Optimized sharing page
5. Optimized Game logo

[New Chess pieces]
1. Frostblaze Dragon: Dragon; Warlock

[Balance]
1. Chess piece
Umbra: now costs 3 Gold (instead of 2) with 800/1600/3200 HP (instead of 700/1400/2800)
Devastator: Delayed Action Bomb deals now 500/800/1100 damages (instead of 600/1000/1400)
Abyssalcrawler: now Ability cooltime

[Patch note]
1. Server Merging: former servers including [Asia] [Europe] and [USA/Canada] will be merged into one worldwide server [Word (to be determined)]
2. You could now choose to switch on/off the Chessboard display on the Home interface via

[New Chess Piece]
1. The Scryer: Feathered, Shaman

[Balance]
1. Abyssalcrawler:
Changed ability from Stealth to Spiral Crawler: Every Base attack will steal [3%/5%/7%] ATK Speed from the enemy. Can stack up to 25 times.
2. Dark Spirit:<
